info.titleen: Many roads and buildings were destroyed.
info.descko: 수재민들을 위해 주민들에게 어떤 도움을 요청했나요?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: Dear people of Charleston, I want to ask for your help.
sentense.en_: Dear people of Charleston, I want to ask for your help.
sentense.ko: 찰스톤 주민 여러분! 여러분의 도움이 필요합니다.

sentense.en: As you know, we suffered a serious flood this past summer.
sentense.en_: As you know, we suffered a serious flood this past summer.
sentense.ko: 아시다시피, 이번 여름에 홍수로 막대한 피해를 입었습니다.

sentense.en: Many roads and buildings were destroyed.
sentense.en_: Many roads and buildings were destroyed.

sentense.en: In addition, many people were injured.
sentense.en_: In addition, many people were injured.
sentense.ko: 거기에 더하여, 많은 사람들이 부상을 당했습니다.
words: n, 부가, 증가, 가산, 부가물, 증축

sentense.en: I'm here today to ask for your donation to our disaster relief fund.
sentense.en_: I'm here today to ask for your donation to our disaster relief fund.
sentense.ko: 저는 여러분에게 재해구호기금 기부를 요청하기 위해 오늘 여기에 왔습니다.

sentense.en: This fund will help the flood victims recover some of their losses.
sentense.en_: This fund will help the flood victims recover some of their losses.
sentense.ko: 이 기금은 수재민들이 피해를 복구하는데 쓰일 것입니다.

sentense.en: Please show your support by sending a generous contribution to the Flood Relief Fund.
sentense.en_: Please show your support by sending a generous contribution to the Flood Relief Fund.
sentense.ko: 수재구호기금에 관대한 기여를 보냄으로써 당신의 지원의 뜻을 보여주세요.
words: 기부, 기증, 공헌, 기여(to, toward), 기부금

sentense.en: Your help now will make their lives better.
sentense.en_: Your help now will make their lives better.
sentense.ko: 여러분의 도움은 그들의 생활이 향상되도록 만들 것입니다.

sentense.en: Thank you in advance for your support.
sentense.en_: Thank you in advance for your support.
